name: get_paper_complete
description: To support interactive query-completion, return minimal information about papers matching a partial query.

query.description: Plain-text partial query string. Will be truncated to first 100 characters.

name: get_papers_by_keywords
description: Get papers by keywords and search filters.

query.description: A plain-text search query string. No special query syntax is supported. Hyphenated query terms yield no matches (replace it with space to find matches).

fields.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to be returned.

publicationTypes.description: Restrict results by publication types. Valid inputs are: Review/JournalArticle/CaseReport/ClinicalTrial/Dataset/Editorial/LettersAndComments/MetaAnalysis/News/Study/Book/BookSection.Use a comma-separated list to include papers with more than one publication types.

openAccessPdf.description: Restrict results to only include papers with a public PDF.

year.description: Restrict results to the given range of publication year (inclusive).

venue.description: Restrict results by venue.Input could also be an ISO4 abbreviation

fieldsOfStudy.description: Restrict results to given field-of-study, using the s2FieldsOfStudy paper field.Available fields are:Computer Science/Medicine/Chemistry...

offset.description: Default: 0.When returning a list of results, start with the element at this position in the list.The sum of offset and limit must be < 10000

limit.description: Default: 100.The maximum number of results to return.Must be <= 100

name: get_paper_details
description: Returns the paper's paperId, url, year, list of authors and so on.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to be returned.

name: get_author_by_name
description: Returns a list of authors. Each author has their authorId and name.

query.description: A plain-text search query string.No special query syntax is supported.Hyphenated query terms yield no matches (replace it with space to find matches).

offset.description: Default: 0.When returning a list of results, start with the element at this position in the list.The sum of offset and limit must be < 10000

limit.description: Default: 100.The maximum number of results to return.Must be <= 100

fields.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to be returned.

name: get_author_details
description: To support interactive query-completion, return minimal information about papers matching a partial query.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to be returned.

offset.description: Default: 0.When returning a list of results, start with the element at this position in the list.The sum of offset and limit must be < 10000

limit.description: Default: 100.The maximum number of results to return.Must be <= 100

fields.description: A comma-separated list of the fields to be returned.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
